splits.name: Arista Networks, Inc.
splits.notes: Board declared Nov 7, 2024. Amendment effective at 4:30 PM EST Dec 3, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Dec 4, 2024. Second 4-for-1 split (first was Nov 2021).

splits.name: Amphenol Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved May 20, 2024. Record date May 31, 2024. Shares distributed Jun 11, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 12, 2024.

splits.name: Broadcom Inc.
splits.notes: Announced Jun 12, 2024. Record date Jul 11, 2024. Amendment effective after close Jul 12, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Jul 15, 2024. First split in company history.

splits.name: Allbirds, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Stockholders approved Aug 13, 2024. Effective at 5:00 PM EDT Sep 4, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 5, 2024. CUSIP changed to 01675A208. Intended to regain Nasdaq minimum bid price compliance.

splits.name: BuzzFeed, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Board and shareholders approved. Effective at 12:01 AM EST May 6, 2024. CUSIP changed to 12430A300. Intended to regain Nasdaq minimum bid price compliance. Applied to Class A and Class B common stock.

splits.name: Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Mar 19, 2024. Shareholders approved Jun 6, 2024. Record date Jun 18, 2024. Shares distributed after close Jun 25, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 26, 2024. First split in company history.

splits.name: The Cooper Companies, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Dec 6, 2023. Effective at 5:00 PM ET Feb 16, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Feb 20, 2024. CUSIP changed to 216648501.

splits.name: Cintas Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved May 2, 2024. Record date Sep 4, 2024. Shares distributed after close Sep 11, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 12, 2024. First split since 2000.

splits.name: Deckers Outdoor Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved. Record date Sep 6, 2024. Amendment effective Sep 13, 2024. Shares distributed Sep 16, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 17, 2024. Second split in company history.

splits.name: Ginkgo Bioworks Holdings, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Shareholders approved Aug 14, 2024. Board approved 1-for-40 ratio Aug 15, 2024. Certificate filed Aug 19, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 20, 2024. CUSIP changed to 37611X209. Intended to regain NYSE minimum bid price compliance.

splits.name: Fluent, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Effective at 6:00 PM ET Apr 11, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Apr 12, 2024. Intended to regain Nasdaq minimum bid price compliance.

splits.name: Finance of America Companies Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Effective at 5:00 PM ET Jul 25, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Jul 26, 2024. CUSIP changed to 31738L206. Intended to regain NYSE minimum bid price compliance.

splits.name: Hyzon Motors Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Effective at 12:01 AM ET Sep 11, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 11, 2024. Intended to regain Nasdaq minimum bid price compliance.

splits.name: Lam Research Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved May 21, 2024. Record date and effective date Oct 2, 2024. Amendment effective at 5:00 PM ET. Split-adjusted trading began Oct 3, 2024. CUSIP changed to 512807306.

splits.name: MicroStrategy Incorporated
splits.notes: Board declared Jul 11, 2024. Record date Aug 1, 2024. Shares distributed after close Aug 7, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 8, 2024. Applied to both Class A and Class B common stock.

splits.name: Mullen Automotive, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Effective at 12:01 AM ET Sep 17, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 17, 2024. Intended to regain Nasdaq minimum bid price compliance. Sixth reverse split for the company.

splits.name: NVIDIA Corporation
splits.notes: Announced May 22, 2024. Record date Jun 6, 2024. Amendment effective at 4:01 PM ET Jun 7, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 10, 2024. Sixth split in company history.

splits.name: New York Community Bancorp, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Shareholders approved Jun 5, 2024. Board approved Jun 26, 2024. Effective at 5:01 PM ET Jul 11, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Jul 12, 2024. CUSIP changed to 649445400. Authorized shares reduced from 2B to 666.7M.

splits.name: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved. Record date Mar 13, 2024. Shares distributed Mar 27, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Mar 28, 2024. Approximately 217,600,000 shares outstanding after split.

splits.name: Palo Alto Networks, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Nov 20, 2024. Record date Dec 12, 2024. Shares distributed after close Dec 13, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Dec 16, 2024. Second split (first was 3-for-1 in Sep 2022).

splits.name: Rent the Runway, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Stockholders approved Mar 21, 2024. Effective at 5:00 PM ET Apr 2, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Apr 3, 2024. CUSIP changed to 76010Y202. Applied to Class A and Class B common stock. Intended to regain Nasdaq minimum bid price compliance.

splits.name: Singularity Future Technology Ltd.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Effective Feb 9, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Feb 12, 2024. Intended to satisfy Nasdaq $1.00 minimum bid price requirement.

splits.name: Sirius XM Holdings Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Effective at 4:05 PM ET Sep 9, 2024, concurrent with Liberty Media split-off and merger. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 10, 2024. Outstanding shares reduced from ~3.8B to ~339M. Not executed for delisting avoidance but to attract institutional investors.

splits.name: Super Micro Computer, Inc.
splits.notes: Board authorized. Announced Aug 6, 2024. Effective at 5:00 PM ET Sep 30, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Oct 1, 2024. First split in company history.

splits.name: Sony Group Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved May 14, 2024. Japanese common stock record date Sep 30, 2024. ADR payable date Oct 8, 2024. Split-adjusted ADR trading began Oct 9, 2024. ADR ratio remained 1:1.

splits.name: Virgin Galactic Holdings, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Stockholders approved Jun 12, 2024. Board approved same day. Effective at 5:00 PM ET Jun 14, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 17, 2024. CUSIP changed to 92766K403. Intended to meet NYSE minimum bid price requirement.

splits.name: The Container Store Group, Inc.
splits.notes: Reverse split. Stockholders approved Aug 28, 2024. Board approved 1-for-15 ratio. Effective at 5:00 PM ET Sep 3, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 4, 2024. CUSIP changed to 210751202. Intended to regain NYSE minimum bid price compliance.

splits.name: Texas Pacific Land Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved. Certificate of Amendment filed Mar 1, 2024. Record date Mar 18, 2024. Shares distributed Mar 26, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Mar 27, 2024.

splits.name: Tractor Supply Company
splits.notes: Board authorized Dec 5, 2024. Record date Dec 16, 2024. Certificate of Amendment filed Dec 19, 2024, effective at 5:00 PM. Split-adjusted trading began Dec 20, 2024. Fifth split since 1994 IPO.

splits.name: Walmart Inc.
splits.notes: Announced Jan 30, 2024. Record date Feb 22, 2024. Certificate of Amendment filed after close Feb 23, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Feb 26, 2024. First split since 1999.

splits.name: Williams-Sonoma, Inc.
splits.notes: Board declared 2-for-1 split via stock dividend. Record date Jun 27, 2024. Shares distributed after close Jul 8, 2024. Split-adjusted trading began Jul 9, 2024.
